labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Latest version of Discord Stable/Public for Windows
data.actual_result: The server name runs into the emotes https://i.imgur.com/d1Vpbit.png
data.expected_result: Emotes shift down below the server name or the server name is shortened with ... at the end.
data.short_description: Long Server Names break Emote List
data.steps_to_repro: - Rename your server to something long - Check your emote list and view that server - etc
